get.description: Retrieve all fish stock data for the authenticated user's UPTD.

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: Search keyword for fish type name

economicLabel.example: Tinggi

403.description: Forbidden - User doesn't have access (not UPTD type 2)

get.description: Retrieve specific fish stock data by ID for the authenticated user's UPTD

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the stock ikan to retrieve

economicLabel.example: Tinggi

404.description: Not Found - Stock ikan not found or doesn't belong to user's UPTD

put.description: Update fish stock quantity for a specific stock item belonging to the authenticated user's UPTD

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the stock ikan to update

economicLabel.example: Tinggi

404.description: Not Found - Stock ikan not found or doesn't belong to user's UPTD

get.description: Retrieve paginated transactions list filtered by user's UPTD with optional search

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: Search keyword for transaction name or invoice ID

get.description: Retrieve products filtered by the user's UPTD and type with optional filtering

post.description: Process and save a new fish transaction with multiple items

message.example: Transaksi tidak dapat dilakukan karena stok ikan tidak tersedia
